name: h3
description: The 2025 Demarini Uprising Drop 12 Fastpitch Softball Bat is a top-tier choice for players seeking a balanced swing feel and superior performance. Certified for USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC play, this bat is versatile and competition-ready. Its one-piece alloy construction, featuring a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter, is crafted from high-strength DX1 Alloy, delivering a more responsive feel with every hit. The vibrant purple and pink colorway adds a stylish touch, while the Big D End Cap is designed to absorb vibrations, ensuring a smooth and comfortable swing experience. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
